amendment.description: An amendment to reduce total amounts appropriated in the bill by $1,130,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce total amounts appropriated in the bill by $1,130,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson (SC) amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 295 (Roll no. 525).
